name: Atomic Orbital VR
description:
You are Inside an atom and must balance the electrons and protons. "VR Wall breaker inside an atom"

Objective

Deflect the incoming protons and electrons into the 6 static ones surrounding you to bring the atoms net charge back to neutral.

1. With your positive and negative hands you can deflect the oncoming protons and electrons in a given direction.

2. Push the 6 static electrons and protons away from you to clear the stage!

Inspiration:

I was inspired when studying chemistry.

In atomic theory and quantum mechanics, an atomic orbital is a mathematical function describing the location and wave-like behavior of an electron in an atom. This function can be used to calculate the probability of finding any electron of an atom in any specific region around the atom's nucleus. The term atomic orbital may also refer to the physical region or space where the electron can be calculated to be present, as predicted by the particular mathematical form of the orbital.
